content.question: The Russian woodcut above (about 1698) symbolizes Peter the Greatâ€™s

choices.label: victory over the Swedes in the Great Northern War
elimination of the Cossacks as a political force within Russia
imposition of Western values on the Russian nobility
initiation of the partition of Poland
struggle with his son, Alexis, for control of Russia

content.answer: imposition of Western values on the Russian nobility

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
